Rio Othon Palace
7.4 Very good
Based on 28 reviews

at first, i was afraid to stay in this hotel, i was very surprised, they gave me a room on level 18 (i stayed for 7 nights.

my room facing eastern side of copacabana. i could see very beautiful sunrise everyday just from the balcony of my room. it is easy to access copacabana beach and walking around. the staffs were also helpful. i think they have made some renovation to the room. it was clean and comfortable. the restaurant for breakfast on 3rd floor has also very good view and good food. i absolutely will stay here again if i have chance to go to rio again.

Pestana Rio Atlantica
7.2 Very good
Based on 27 reviews

Can't really beat the location. Right on the main artery of Copacabana - Avenida Atlantica! If you are willing to pay some money then you will have a nice ocean view room.

Night club "Help" is 2 minutes away. I did not care for the breakfast layout. Fruit was questionable, service was slow, bread not fresh. Food in general was not too good. I did, however, enjoy the bar. They made a caipirinha that pretty much knocked me on my ass (exaggeration of course) but it had a nice kick to it. Very accommodating service with hotel staff.

Orla Copacabana Hotel
7.7 Very good
Based on 56 reviews

The location right at the end of copacabana is perfect. Two metro stations within 5-10 minutes. Our room was clean, bathroom good and clean, too.

Unfortunately no view, sea view rooms available but more expensive. The breakfast buffet was very good, the staff very helpful. We liked the hotel so much that we booked it for another stay.

More about Brazil

Brazil remains a popular destination with travelers to South America. Agoda.com understands that traveler want to get the best deal. That's why we offer you the best online rates at 36748 hotels nationwide. Consisting of 27 regions, each with its own unique appeal, the country offers visitors plenty of different areas to explore. The country offers 987 unique cities to discover such as Sao Paulo, Rio De Janeiro, Foz Do Iguacu. Choose your travel dates and let Agoda.com find the perfect hotel in Brazil for you. Our Lowest Rate Guarantee means you won’t find better rates anywhere.

I did not care for the breakfast layout. Fruit was questionable, service was slow, bread not fresh. Food in general was not too good. I did, however, enjoy the bar. They made a caipirinha that pretty much knocked me on my ass (exaggeration of course) but it had a nice kick to it. Very accommodating service with hotel staff. The staff were nice and helpful. ALTA CHARISS YAP , Philippines Juma Amazon Lodge 10 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Orla Copacabana Hotel 7.7 Very good Based on 56 reviews The location right at the end of copacabana is perfect. Two metro stations within 5-10 minutes. Our room was clean, bathroom good and clean, too. Unfortunately no view, sea view rooms available but more expensive. The breakfast buffet was very good, the staff very helpful. We liked the hotel so much that we booked it for another stay.
